metadata.title: CVE-2017-0462 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Qualcomm Seemp driver couldenable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code within thecontext of the kernel. This issue is rated as High because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-33353601. References: QC-CR#1102288.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
